message_1: What is the complexity class of a decision problem that can be solved in O(n^3) time using a deterministic Turing machine, where n is the size of the input?
message_2: The complexity class of a decision problem that can be solved in O(n^3) time using a deterministic Turing machine is P (Polynomial Time). This is because the problem can be solved in polynomial time with respect to the input size n.
